Divonis Bebas, Sofyan Basir Bisa Jadi Bos PLN Lagi?
05 Nov 2019, 00:28 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - Mantan Direktur Utama PT PLN (Persero) Sofyan Basir telah divonis bebas. Sofyan dinyatakan tidak terbukti memfasilitasi pemberian suap dari pengusaha Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo kepada mantan Anggota DPR Eni Maulani Saragih dan mantan Menteri Sosial Idrus Marham."Mengadili menyatakan terdakwa Sofyan Basir tidak terbukti secara sah dan meyakinkan sebagaimana dakwaan pertama dan kedua," kata hakim ketua Hariono saat membacakan amar putusan dalam sidang di Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta, Jalan Bungur Besar Raya, Jakarta Pusat, kemarin (4/11/2019).Atas vonis tersebut, Menteri Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN) Erick Thohir pun memberi respons. Erick juga bicara mengenai peluang kembalinya Sofyan Basir memimpin PLN.Simak berita selengkapnya dirangkum detikcom:Lanjut ke halaman berikutnya >>> (ang/ang)

Sentenced Free, Sofyan Basir Can Be the Boss of PLN Again?
05 Nov 2019, 00:28 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: Ari Saputra

Jakarta - Former Managing Director of PT PLN (Persero) Sofyan Basir has been sentenced. Sofyan was declared unproven to facilitate the bribery of businessman Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo to former DPR member Eni Maulani Saragih and former Social Minister Idrus Marham. "Prosecuting stated that the defendant Sofyan Basir was not legally and convincingly proven as the first and second indictments," said chief judge Hariono when read out the verdict in the trial at the Jakarta Corruption Court, Jalan Bungur Besar Raya, Central Jakarta, yesterday (11/4/2019). On the verdict, the Minister of State-Owned Enterprises (BUMN) Erick Thohir also responded. Erick also talked about the chance of Sofyan Basir returning to lead PLN.
